text: Hi, is there a way to add custom attributes on body tag?
Hey <@U0154G8MTA6> you should be able to add classes to the body in the DM but in order to add custom attributes you would have to use coded templates or JS to accomplish this.
Is there a way to prevent default modules (like search) from loading their own CSS files?
you can clone any HubSpot made modules and change them in any way you want, including removing or changing the associated CSS.
